login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Sign in to your HelloHumans account

register.title: Create a Free Account
register.subtitle: No credit card required
register.agreement: By signing up, you agree to our terms and conditions.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.description: We will send you reset instructions via email.
forgotPassword.errorMessage: An error occurred. Please try again.
forgotPassword.successMessage: A reset email has been sent. Check your inbox and follow the instructions.
forgotPassword.successInfoMessage: If we have this email address, we will send you an email with instructions to reset your password.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.passwordErrorShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
resetPassword.successMessage: Success! Your password has been reset.

dashboard.finalizeConfigurationDescription: Wir helfen Ihnen, eine Umgebung zu schaffen, die Ihre Besucher begeistern wird. Es ist ganz einfach und dauert nur wenige Minuten.
dashboard.usageItemDescriptionAudience: Gesamtzahl der Besucher, die mit Ihrem Chatbot interagiert haben.
dashboard.usageItemDescriptionInteractions: Automatisierte Gespräche, die vom Bot verwaltet werden.

trialExpired.title: Continue to fully leverage Hellohumans
trialExpired.trialExpired: Your trial with all features expired on {date}. Keep going. Compare plans and choose the best option for your business.
trialExpired.downgradeDescription: You can downgrade anytime and use our lifetime free plan. You can change it whenever you want.
trialExpired.tooltipProcessedConversations: Conversations represent the total number of chats in live chat

Index.trial_remaining: Your full trial ends in {count} day | Your full trial ends in {count} days
Index.choose_offer_description: Choose an offer and select additional modules in the next step.

Modules.trialRemaining: Your full trial ends in {count} day | Your full trial ends in {count} days
Modules.title: Select your plan
Modules.description: Choose a plan and select modules in the next step.

notFound.title: Error 403
notFound.message: You do not have permission to access this resource.

serverError.title: Oops, something went wrong.
serverError.description: Click the button to reload the page :
serverError.engineeringTeam: ... in the meantime, the engineering team has been informed of the issue.

unauthorized.title: Oops, page not found.
unauthorized.description: Sorry, the page you're looking for cannot be found.
unauthorized.linkDescription: The link you followed may be broken or no longer exists.

default.title: Unexpected Error
default.message: An error occurred, but it is not listed here.
